page.title: 05NORTON STRAWBERRY GROWERS.
page.content: popular variety is the CAMBRIDGE FAVOURITE because of its abundant cropping,keeping quality and taste. Another main crop is raspberries selling at 36p per lb and,an experiment is being made to guage customer reaction by growing gooseberries,loganberries and blackberries for self-picking. The attraction to the customer of being able to self-pick is cheapness,self-ascertained quality and freshness. Much of thw fruit is picked for immediate consumption but much of thr fruit is also either frozen, or made into puree or jam. There are three permanent employees but during the season more staff are employed to act as cashiers and for security reasons. Unfortunately the theft of fruit increases year by year.
